title: HTML Basics
description: Understand the structure of web pages, tags, elements, attributes, and semantic HTML fundamentals.

title: Advanced HTML5
description: Learn forms, multimedia, accessibility, SEO tags, canvas, APIs, and modern HTML5 features.

title: HTML Forms & Validation
description: Master HTML forms, validation, input types, labels, radio buttons, checkboxes, and accessibility tips.

title: CSS Fundamentals
description: Learn styling basics: colors, fonts, spacing, borders, backgrounds, selectors, and layout essentials.

title: Flexbox & CSS Grid Mastery
description: Master modern layouts using Flexbox and Grid. Build fully responsive structures with ease.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Understand breakpoints, fluid layouts, rem units, media queries, and mobile-first design.

title: JavaScript Basics
description: Learn variables, data types, operators, conditions, loops, DOM basics, and beginner JS logic.

title: JavaScript DOM Manipulation
description: Understand query selectors, events, dynamic elements, traversing DOM, and real-time DOM operations.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Dive deeper into closures, promises, async/await, ES6 features, modules, and advanced functions.

title: React Basics
description: Understand components, props, JSX, state, event handling, hooks, and the basics of building SPAs.

title: React Hooks & State Management
description: Master useState, useEffect, useRef, custom hooks, and state management patterns.

title: Advanced React Performance
description: Learn memoization, useCallback, useMemo, lazy loading, optimization, and code splitting.
